entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
